column2: "Nna mbanyin baasa yi gyaa Job bua
column3: osiandɛ obu noho tseneneenyi wɔ nankasa n'enyi do."

column2: "Nna Buzinyi Barakel ba Elihu a ofi Ram ebusua mu no
column3: n'ebufuw dzɛwee wɔ Job do
column4: osiandɛ obuu noho tseneneenyi seen Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na no bo fuuw ne mfɛfo baasa no so; osiandɛ woennya mbuae biara bio
column3: naaso nna woebu Job fɔ."

column2: "Afei nna Elihu atweɔn ana ɔrekasa akyerɛ Job
column3: osiandɛ hɔn wɔyɛ mpanyin sen ɔno."

column2: "Na aber a Elihu hun dɛ mbuae nnyi mbanyin baasa no anomu bio no
column3: nna n'ebufuw dzɛwee."

column2: "Nna Buzinyi Barakel ba Elihu buae na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Meyɛ abofra
column4: na hom dze wɔyɛ nkɔdaa; Dɛm ntsi na mikyinkyimii
column5: na mammper dɛ mebɛkyerɛ hom m'adwen."

column3: Nyinkyɛr nkasa ana
column4: Ɛhɛɛ ma mfe dodow nkyerɛkyerɛ nyansa."

column3: Na Otumfo no no sunsum na ɔma hɔn ntseasee."
Nkyii so nnyɛ hɔn a woenyin no na wɔtse atsɛmbusɛm ase."
Hom ntsie me; Mo so mebɛkyerɛ m'adwen."
motweɔɔn hom nsɛm
column5: Mber a hom rohwehwɛ dza wɔbɛse no."

column3: mekyɛɛn aso maa hom
column5: obiara nnyi hɔ a ne nsɛm bɔɔ Job

column2: "Hom nhwɛ yie ma hom annse dɛ
column3: Yeehu nyansa; Nyankopɔn na ɔbɔ no gu

column2: "Na ɔnnhyehyɛɛ ne nsɛm nntsiaa me; Nkyii so meremmfa hom nsɛm mu mbua no."

column3: mmbua bio: Hom nnyi asɛm kor mpo ka."
osiandɛ hom nnkasa ntsi
Emi so mebɛkyerɛ m'adwen."

column2: "Na nsɛm ahyɛ me ma; Sunsum a ɔwɔ mo mu no hyɛ me."

column3: me yafun tse dɛ nsa a wonntuu ano; Ɔtse dɛ nsa nwoma nkotoku afofor a ɔreyɛ apaapaa."
ma mo ho atɔ me; Mubobue m'anofamfa na mebua."
mma mma monnhwɛ nyimpa biara enyim; Nkyii so meremmfa abɔdzin ndzɛfɛdzɛfɛw mma nyimpa biara."
Ɔno dze nkyɛ me yɛfo bɛfa me akɔ ntsɛmara."
